unnormalised: Breaking News: Lucknowntli ek aanandaachi khabar!
normalised: Breaking News: Lucknowkhanche ek kallzak lagpi kathan!

unnormalised: Internetacher khup dhamaal asa, Mr. Rajeev Sharma, ek nivrutt zalele shaley shikshak, tanka tanchi purvilichi vidhyarthi 10/10/2024 haka ek motho satkar keli. Ti vidhyarthi, aata engineeran thaun doctor poriant safal professionals asa, tanka Mr. Sharmachi nistha yaad asa. "To fakt ek shikshak mhunn na, to ek margdarshak aslo," Ms. Aisha Khan sangli, ji ek mukhy software engineer asa. Tinne yaad keli ki Mr. Sharma hamesha soglyak adhar dita – bailyank legit!
normalised: Internetacher dhadpadhi chollea, Mister Rajeev Sharma, nivrutt zalele xalleche xikxok, tankam 10vem October don hozar ani tevisacher tanchim purviuchim xisyamni ek vhodd felya divn bhorpur mhon dilem. Xisya, zannim atam engineeramchea doktoream poriant safolya zoddlam, Mister Sharma-chem nisthevann yad kelen. "Te fakt ek xikxok nasle, te margdarxak asle," Miss Aisha Khan, ek mukhel software engineer sangta. Tine yad kelem ki Mister Sharma sodanch dor ekleak mhonan samballto – even balankui!

unnormalised: Lucknow Civic Centre haka kelole karyakrama khaatir khub maanvanti lok ayle, tankant sthanik rajkaranni lok and shikshan adhikari legit asle. Kitleank Mr. Sharmacha yogdaan bhavi pidhi ghatuvpak bhareponan ullo keli. Rs. 50,000 cha daan legit vidhyarthiyan Mr. Sharmacha nivrutti jivank madad korpak zamaa keli. Tanhe e maan maanpuri bhassan gheitle, mhunnun tanka fakt tanchi kamgiri kortana ashe.
normalised: Lucknow Civic Centre-ant zalelya karyakramant veg-veglle maneste lok hadir asle, jemant thollave rajkarni ani xikxon-khateantle odhikari asle. Zaitianni Mister Sharma-chea bhavixyak akar diunchea yogdanachi tarlikai keli. Rupi ponnas hozarachim donation-ui xisyamni Mister Sharma-chea nivrutt jivitak madad korunk eksarkha keli. Tannim mhonan te dhyan ghetlem, sangun ki te tanchem kortavyanuch kortale.

unnormalised: Khabar jungli aag pori pasarli ani #RespectForTeachers and #LucknowLegend X haka trending asa. Kitleank Mr. Sharmachi bharpuri stuti karta ek shikshakachi khari bhavana dakhovpak, koni jann poshta ani margdarshan karta konich expect kortana na. Kinni aazchi vidhyarthiyan mazak keli ki te aasha korta somedis konnakitri tanchi chit'ta aasu, tanka ₹500 diyevpak nivrutti zalya uprant.
normalised: Khobor agnivadi bhaxen pasar zali ani hash Respect For Teachers ani hash Lucknow Legend X-acher trending cholta. Zaitianni Mister Sharma-che tarlikai kelea ek khorea xikxokacho bhav dakhovpak, konnuch mhonsunk nashtana poshun margdarxak korunk. Atanche kain xisyamni majak keli ki tancho umed asa ki konn tari tancho dhyaan dilear tankam nivrutt zhalea uprant rupi panchxim ditole.

unnormalised: Mr. Sharmachi khani yaad karta shikshakacho mazbot asar amchi jivnavar asa. Ti ek khari inspo asa! Amche soglyan thaun, Mr. Rajeev Sharma haka motho salaam! Bori melloli sir!
normalised: Mister Sharma-chi khanni amkam yad dita ki xikxokanchea jivitacher kitlo gombhir porinnam zata. Tem khorech inspo! Amchea soglleanche, Mister Rajeev Sharma-kak ek vhodd salute! Barech favo sarr!
